Code: EXEC SQL SELECT t1.NRENDOS, t1.NRPARCEL, t1.OCORHIST, char(t2.dtinivig,local), t1.dacparc, t1.num_apolice, t2.tipo_endosso FROM seguros.v1parcela WHERE t1.num_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE and t2.dtinivig >= :DTINIVIG and t1.situacao = '0' and t1.num_apolice = t2.num_apolice and t1.nrendos = t2.nrendos ORDER BY 1,2,4 END SQL
